Text: FW Thanksgiving HolidayOriginal Message From Meyer Mitch Sent Tuesday November AM To Stan HortonENRON Subject RE Thanksgiving Holiday Thanks for the note Stan It is nice to know that with all of the distractions within our company lately you still recognize the things we should be thankful for I know you have your hands full with the current situation but I hope you take time to enjoy the holidays with your family and friends as well Sincerely Mitch Meyer Original Message From Enron NRON On Behalf Of Stan HortonENRON Sent Monday November PM To Enron Global Services NRON Subject Thanksgiving Holiday As we approach the Thanksgiving Holiday I want to take this opportunity to wish you and yours a safe and happy Holiday With the recent events in our nation giving thanks this year has taken on a whole new meaning This Thanksgiving we honor the brave enduring heroes who gave their lives as well as those who are abroad fighting for freedom We can be thankful for our great nation and for the world coming together I recognize that here at Enron we are working through some challenging times and that everyone in the organization is working hard Thank you for your continued dedication Please take some time over the Holiday to enjoy your family and friends Happy Thanksgiving Stan

RE Thanksgiving HolidayAnd what a great stress reliever kids are Enjoy Original Message From Horton Stanley Sent Tuesday November AM To Meyer Mitch Subject RE Thanksgiving Holiday Thanks Mitch I have month old twins who could care less about my distractions They are my stress outlet now Happy Thanksgiving Original Message From Meyer Mitch Sent Tuesday November AM To Horton Stanley Subject FW Thanksgiving Holiday Original Message From Meyer Mitch Sent Tuesday November AM To Stan HortonENRON Subject RE Thanksgiving Holiday Thanks for the note Stan It is nice to know that with all of the distractions within our company lately you still recognize the things we should be thankful for I know you have your hands full with the current situation but I hope you take time to enjoy the holidays with your family and friends as well Sincerely Mitch Meyer Original Message From Enron NRON On Behalf Of Stan HortonENRON Sent Monday November PM To Enron Global Services NRON Subject Thanksgiving Holiday As we approach the Thanksgiving Holiday I want to take this opportunity to wish you and yours a safe and happy Holiday With the recent events in our nation giving thanks this year has taken on a whole new meaning This Thanksgiving we honor the brave enduring heroes who gave their lives as well as those who are abroad fighting for freedom We can be thankful for our great nation and for the world coming together I recognize that here at Enron we are working through some challenging times and that everyone in the organization is working hard Thank you for your continued dedication Please take some time over the Holiday to enjoy your family and friends Happy Thanksgiving Stan
